I've tried to repeat the failure but haven't been successful.

Maybe this has something to do with bug 44385 ?

were you looking for a plugin? fragment? extension point?
I could not reproduce the error in all of these cases in I-20031008

I believe it was "plugin" "references" "all plugins", but I'm not 100% sure. I
couldn't reproduce it anyway.

Everything that we display in the search view is an IPluginObject.
Dejan, do you think this could have resulted from a transient OSGi model 
change.

Not unless 'OSGi' support checkbox is checked in 'Work in Progress' preference 
page.

the date of the driver used when reporting the bug is prior to the 
introduction of the preference page.  So I'm guessing it was a transient error 
that has gone away.
